results.name: Characteristic function of A154809 (numbers that are not binary palindromes)
comment: a(n)=1 if n is in A154809, a(n)=0 otherwise.
Identical to parity of A086757 (Smallest prime p such that n is a palindrome in base p representation)
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
results.author: _Jeremy Gardiner_, May 23 2010
